p: The EUCLEG collection consists of 480 accessions belonging to maturity groups (MG) 000, 00, 0 and I/II, and includes 210 improved varieties, 216 breeding lines and 54 landraces. A detailed description of this collection is provided in Supplementary Table 1. This collection was made in collaboration with seed companies and gene banks by considering the accessions with diverse geographical origins, with varying levels of selection (landraces, varieties and breeding lines), and their relevance for European soybean breeders.
